10 #include <boost/locale/boundary/types.hpp>
11 
12 namespace boost {
13 namespace locale {
14 namespace boundary {
15 
19 
46  template<typename IteratorType>
47  class boundary_point {
48  public:
52  typedef IteratorType iterator_type;
53 
57  boundary_point() : rule_(0) {}
58 
62  boundary_point(iterator_type p,rule_type r) :
63  iterator_(p),
64  rule_(r)
65  {
66  }
70  void iterator(iterator_type i)
71  {
72  iterator_ = i;
73  }
77  void rule(rule_type r)
78  {
79  rule_ = r;
80  }
84  iterator_type iterator() const
85  {
86  return iterator_;
87  }
91  rule_type rule() const
92  {
93  return rule_;
94  }
98  bool operator==(boundary_point const &other) const
99  {
100  return iterator_ == other.iterator_ && rule_ = other.rule_;
101  }
105  bool operator!=(boundary_point const &other) const
106  {
107  return !(*this==other);
108  }
112  bool operator==(iterator_type const &other) const
113  {
114  return iterator_ == other;
115  }
119  bool operator!=(iterator_type const &other) const
120  {
121  return iterator_ != other;
122  }
123 
127  operator iterator_type ()const
128  {
129  return iterator_;
130  }
131 
132  private:
133  iterator_type iterator_;
134  rule_type rule_;
135 
136  };
140  template<typename BaseIterator>
141  bool operator==(BaseIterator const &l,boundary_point<BaseIterator> const &r)
142  {
143  return r==l;
144  }
148  template<typename BaseIterator>
149  bool operator!=(BaseIterator const &l,boundary_point<BaseIterator> const &r)
150  {
151  return r!=l;
152  }
153 
155 
156  typedef boundary_point<std::string::const_iterator> sboundary_point;
157  typedef boundary_point<std::wstring::const_iterator> wsboundary_point;
158  #ifdef BOOST_LOCALE_ENABLE_CHAR16_T
159  typedef boundary_point<std::u16string::const_iterator> u16sboundary_point;
160  #endif
161  #ifdef BOOST_LOCALE_ENABLE_CHAR32_T
162  typedef boundary_point<std::u32string::const_iterator> u32sboundary_point;
163  #endif
164 
165  typedef boundary_point<char const *> cboundary_point;
166  typedef boundary_point<wchar_t const *> wcboundary_point;
167  #ifdef BOOST_LOCALE_ENABLE_CHAR16_T
168  typedef boundary_point<char16_t const *> u16cboundary_point;
169  #endif
170  #ifdef BOOST_LOCALE_ENABLE_CHAR32_T
171  typedef boundary_point<char32_t const *> u32cboundary_point;
172  #endif
173 
174 
175 } // boundary
176 } // locale
177 } // boost

180 #endif
